author: John Mauro
description:
ITCH! is the new feminist folk horror by the Bram Stoker and British Fantasy Award nominated author Gemma Amor. As the novel opens, Josie Jackson returns to her rural hometown following a bitter breakup with her abusive partner, Lena. Already physically and emotionally broken, Josie is unlikely to find any comfort with her temperamental widower […]

The post REVIEW: ITCH! by Gemma Amor appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: ITCH! by Gemma Amor
